scoring_method: calculated by dividing the shoot fresh weight (whri_SHTFWT_01_LAB) by the shoot dry weight (whri_SHTDWT_01_LAB) and multiplying the result by 100.
when_to_score: after fresh and dry weights have been measured
stage_scored: Vegetative, five to eight leaf stage
precautions: ensure correct equation and arguments are used

scoring_method: Determined using the micro Kjeldahl method; approximately 0.1 g subsample of dried plant material was digested for 1 h, following the addition of 1 mL of hydrogen peroxide and 2 mL of a H2SO4/Se catalyst (Bradstreet, 1965). Inductively coupled plasma emission spectrometry (JY Ultima 2; Jobin Yvon) was used to determine mineral concentrations in digested shoot material.
when_to_score: Samples taken during vegetative growth at 101, 97, and 93 d growth to represent precommercial maturi
stage_scored: Vegetative, five to eight leaf stage
precautions: Ensure no contamination from compost/soil; ensure sample is dried adequately
materials: paper bags; oven; tissue grinding machine; balance; digestion block; Inductively coupled plasma atomic emission spectroscopy (ICP-AES)
calibrated_against: Certified Reference Material with known elemental composition
instrumentation_required: Apex type 529AA mill; Apex Construction; Inductively coupled plasma emission spectrometry (JY Ultima 2; Jobin Yvon)
related_characters: fresh weight; dry weight; percentage dry weight
